main.opener: Been a while since things felt predictable, huh?

I wish I could do more, but hesitation is dangerous right now.
Sometimes I wonder if this city can ever go back to normal. If it ever was.

Refusing to help someone today felt like a betrayal, but policy leaves no room for doubt.
I try to believe in the Innovators, in fixing this system, but every choice chips away at what’s left of me.
